author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

Hello,

in a follow up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28039 I quickly had a look into how to reduce the redundancy of the two `PixelHitMatchers` in the `ElectronSeedGenerator`, as anticipated in this comment [1]. The first thing I realized was that a big chunk of the PixelHitMatcher is obsolete, as indicated by this over 6 years old comment [2]. This includes so much code that it's probably a good to have a PR that removes this code before thinking of any other changes.

As a little side effect, I moved the related ElectronSeedProducer plugin into a single cc file and (more unrelated) moved the only remaining class from EgammaElectronProducers/interface to the plugins directory because only the plugins depend on this class and therefore a separate EgammaElectronProducers library is not needed.

[1] https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28039#discussion_r329598269
[2] https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/RecoEgamma/EgammaElectronAlgos/src/PixelHitMatcher.cc#L249

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, local matrix tests pass.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No backport intended.
title: Cleanup obsolete part from Egamma PixelHitMatcher class
